app.title.comment: Main application title displayed in the header and browser tab

nav.home.comment: Navigation menu item for the home/dashboard page

nav.project.comment: Navigation menu item for project management

nav.book.comment: Navigation menu item for book overview

nav.manuscript.comment: Navigation menu item for manuscript editing

nav.casting.comment: Navigation menu item for voice casting/assignment

nav.characters.comment: Navigation menu item for character management

nav.dossier.comment: Navigation menu item for character dossier/profiles

nav.planning.comment: Navigation menu item for audiobook production planning

nav.ssml.comment: Navigation menu item for SSML generation/editing

nav.voice.comment: Navigation menu item for voice management

nav.packaging.comment: Navigation menu item for final audiobook packaging

nav.settings.comment: Navigation menu item for application settings

status.ready.comment: Status indicator showing the system is ready for use

status.generating.comment: Status indicator showing content generation in progress

status.progress.comment: Progress indicator with percentage and optional note. {{pct}} is the percentage number, {{note}} is additional progress information

status.openProject.comment: Message shown when no project is loaded, prompting user to open one
